title: Star Wars Rebels Tactical Missions
opening: As a leader in the burgeoning Rebel Alliance, your task is to organize strikes against the Galactic Empire, gathering allies and resources on various planets to strengthen your cause.

episodes.name: Spark of Rebellion
episodes.description: Start your journey on Lothal, a planet under the control of the Empire, and establish a base for Rebel operations.

steps.outcome: You meet with a local informant who provides key logistic details about the Empire’s operations.
You successfully avoid an Imperial patrol, ensuring the safety of your team.
You host a secret meeting to inspire local residents to join the Rebel cause.
During the recruitment drive, you manage to evade an Imperial crackdown, saving many potential rebels.
Your team infiltrates an Imperial supply depot undetected.
You successfully steal critical supplies, aiding the Rebel logistics.

episodes.name: Droids in Distress
episodes.description: Prevent the Empire from exploiting new droid technologies that could tip the balance in their favor.

steps.outcome: Your scouts locate the hidden droid facility used by the Empire for upgrades.
Analysis reveals weak points in the facility’s defense system, planning for a less risky infiltration.
Your team expertly disables the security system, allowing for safe entry.
You sabotage the key equipment, rendering the droid upgrades useless to the Empire.
Your team quickly evacuates the facility before the Empire can respond.
In a high-stakes chase, you successfully evade pursuing Imperial forces.

end: With your efforts on Lothal and thwarting the Empire's droid advancements, the Rebel Alliance grows stronger. The galaxy awaits your next moves, ready for more critical missions.
